channel.title: Comments on: Tutorial available, crash bugs fixed and gameplay balanced

item.title: By: !!!!!!
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/tutorial-available-crash-bugs-fixed-and-gameplay-balanced/#comment-42">!!!!!!</a>.
Thanks now working. :)

item.title: By: Solace
item.dc:creator: Solace
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/tutorial-available-crash-bugs-fixed-and-gameplay-balanced/#comment-42">!!!!!!</a>.
Hey thanks for letting us know. Looks like all 3 game servers either crashed or ran out of memory in the last day. I've fixed this now and am in the process of adding more monitors to detect when the game isn't working.
Thanks, Tim
item.content:encoded:
In reply to !!!!!!.

Hey thanks for letting us know. Looks like all 3 game servers either crashed or ran out of memory in the last day. I’ve fixed this now and am in the process of adding more monitors to detect when the game isn’t working.

Thanks, Tim
